attributes.action: British jobs for British workers - Stop Total & Irem exporting British jobs in Llincolnshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown said in 2007 - British jobs for British workers. But at Total Lincolnshire it's British jobs for foreign workers. With the mess the Banks and Government are making of the economy, Gordon Brown must intervene and STOP THIS NOW. We also need to stop buying Total fuel immediately - if Total won't support British workers in Britain then don't line their pockets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
